text: “Guma the fhum mpiiŋsɨga phuninin ŋaara guma kegi fhuvara. Ana maaŋ muunga, ana the vuzvugirga, ana the vuzvugirga fhu. Ana vhɨra the nzuai buni mbararav, ana kɨr the segɨrga. Nde vhɨra kha bigɨna phuni, nde vhɨra nin ŋgargirga tuktɨgi fhuvara. Nde Fhe Bakɨmen ŋgarɨv vhɨra ŋkɨɨa gum bigɨn ŋgargirga tuktɨgi fhuvara.”
